name: Around the World in 80 Seconds!
description:
You have 80 seconds and 6 health points to make it around the world! Can you do it?! (Probably, yes.)

Up and Down Arrows to select your choice. Z to choose!

Made for #LDJAM3 this entry is made in Pico 8 (http://www.lexaloffle.com/pico-8.php) Originally intended for the 48 hr Compo time constraints and some fails with file transfers pushed the deadline into the 72hr Jam. A good practice for learning this tiny gaming suite and it was really enjoyable to make.
